channel.title: Comments on: WiFi in Austria

item.title: By: Beate
item.dc:creator: Beate
item.description: 19,98 Euro for 2 hours is a good price. In relation to other offers/countries you don췂t have to use 2 hours at once but whenever you need it. In any case much cheaper and faster than GPRS and more comfortable than internet cafes.
item.content:encoded: 19,98 Euro for 2 hours is a good price. In relation to other offers/countries you don췂t have to use 2 hours at once but whenever you need it. In any case much cheaper and faster than GPRS and more comfortable than internet cafes.

item.title: By: tomas
item.dc:creator: tomas
item.description:
hmmm, i'm using it daily here, so i can't be all that dissatisfied with the price ;-)
but when i think about the fact that i give away this kind of access for free in copenhagen....
i appreciate the fact that metronet is quite easy to find here, and their service is good, and just for the record, i'd never consider using gprs for anything except emergency e-mail ;-)
item.content:encoded:
hmmm, i’m using it daily here, so i can’t be all that dissatisfied with the price 游땔

but when i think about the fact that i give away this kind of access for free in copenhagen….

i appreciate the fact that metronet is quite easy to find here, and their service is good, and just for the record, i’d never consider using gprs for anything except emergency e-mail 游땔
